headline: CEOs on Guard as Trump Rattles Companies With Series of Edicts
summary: In the last week, the president has fired off a series of demands and edicts aimed at C-suites, all in service of shoring up his political fortunes as midterm elections approach.  Trump signed an executive order pressing defense contractors to cut buybacks, and individually called out Raytheon, the defense unit of RTX Corp., an aerospace and defense behemoth that supplies the Patriot missile system and Pratt & Whitney jet engines to the Defense Department.

content.title: CEOs on Guard as Trump Rattles Companies With Series of Edicts
